body.name: Yaak Queen Mattress, 10 Inch Queen Size Mattress in a Box, Individual Pocket Spring Hybrid Mattress with Breathable Memory Foam, Motion Isolation, Medium Firm Queen Bed Mattress 80"x60"x10"
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 44 mins
features: A Healthier Night's Sleep: With its superior support and pressure-relieving properties, Yaak Spring Mattress can help reduce aches and pains, allowing you to wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Please ensure that no one is standing in the direction where the mattress is rolling out to prevent any unnecessary injuries.

Optimal Support and Comfort: Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, the innerspring mattress offers personalized support that aligns your spine and reduces pressure points. Each coil works Individual ly to contour to your body. Experience the difference in your sleep quality.

Motion Isolation: Say goodbye to being disturbed by your partner's movements during the night. Our individual spring system effectively isolates motion, ensuring that you can enjoy undisturbed sleep, even if your partner tosses and turns.

Breathable and Cool Sleep: The hybrid queen mattress is designed with temperature regulation in mind. It promotes airflow, preventing heat buildup and helping you stay cool and comfortable throughout the night.

Satisfaction Guarantee: Yaak mattresses provide a 10-year warranty. If you have any questions, please contact us promptly. Our expert customer service team is available to assist you with any hesitations, problems, or questions you may have. Note: Unroll your mattress and allow an extra 48-72 hours for full and proper expansion in a room temperature setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and support, Great mattress!
reviews.reviewText: Have to say this is one of the most satisfying shopping experience I had recently. The memory foam in this mattress is exceptionally comfortable, and the internal structure provides excellent support. The thickness of the mattress is just right, and the size is perfect for my room. Prolonged hours of desk work have intermittently caused lower back pain for me. However, after sleeping on this mattress for a few nights, I feel comfortable throughout my entire back, and I wake up in the morning without any soreness. I am particularly satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed by the design, 10/10
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed by the design and how comfortable it is. The hybrid design does make a difference from the traditional spring mattress and this is definitely worth the money. It has great support and doesn’t come with any weird smells. I returned my previous mattress due to the weird smell it came with, and this one doesn’t have this issue at all. I would definitely rate this a 10/10 purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 11 year old and she loves it. She has great sleep bit the mattress is on the softer side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great mattress! It is a game-changer for me. The balance between softness and firmness is just right, creating the perfect harmony for a good night's sleep. It can be a challenging to find a suitable mattress, but this one perfectly adapts to my body and provides me with a personalized sleeping experience. I wake up feeling refreshed now. My body has less aches and pains. I didn’t have much expectations, but this mattress suprised me, so I highly recommend this mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cost effective mattress with budge in mind
reviews.reviewText: I would like to rent room out so I am looking for cost effective mattress. At the friend’s recommendation, I purchased this one (Yaak full mattress, 10 inch full size mattress in a box, individual pocket spring hybrid one with breathable memory form, motion isolation and medium firm full bed with size 75”x54”x10” for my full size bed. It is very comfortable and nicely fit to my room. Moreover, it has reasonable price with 10 year warranty. When one opens it, it will expand automatically and constantly. I tried myself on this bed for a few nights, it is comparable to any mattress of brand name. I would recommend it to anyone who is seeking mattress with budge in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this mattress. It's very breathable and doesn't feel stuffy when I sleep on it. The blade that comes with the mattress is also thoughtfully designed and can be used to open the mattress package easily and smoothly without worrying about damaging the surface of the mattress.I chose a medium firm mattress and found it to be supportive enough and not too hard. Lying on it is like sleeping among the clouds. Overall, it’s a economical and ideal mattress of good quality. I recommend it to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice one! I made a significant upgrade to my sleep sanctuary with the purchase of a hybrid queen-size mattress, and I am genuinely thrilled with the transformative impact it has had on my nightly rest. This mattress has seamlessly blended the best of both worlds, offering a perfect balance of support and comfort. The combination of memory foam and innerspring technology creates a harmonious balance, cradling my body while providing the proper support. Whether I'm a back, side, or stomach sleeper, this hybrid mattress caters to all sleeping positions. The adaptive nature of the mattress ensures that I wake up without any stiffness or discomfort, regardless of how I choose to sleep. My hybrid queen-size mattress has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish it could have more foam because you slightly feel the springs, but it’s pretty decent. Not really uncountable, but yeah, I wish it could have more foam. If you are desperate and broke for a 400 hundred dollars mattress like me, a good option. I feel like with time, you will start feeling the springs. So if I was you I would buy this mattress, while you save money for a better one from furniture. But to end, is NOT really bad trust me.
